meanings.definition: A person who physically abuses their spouse.
meanings.sent1: The police arrested the wifebeater for hurting his wife.
meanings.sent2: The community rallied together to support the victims of the wifebeater.
meanings.sent3: The wifebeater tried to pick a fight with a lamppost, but the lamppost didn't fight back.
meanings.sent4: The dark shadow of the wifebeater loomed over the peaceful neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The wifebeater's actions left a permanent scar on the family.

meanings.definition: A sleeveless undershirt typically worn by men.
meanings.sent1: He wore a wifebeater to stay cool in the summer heat.
meanings.sent2: The athlete preferred to train in a wifebeater for better mobility.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistook the wifebeater hanging on the line for a new toy.
meanings.sent4: The wifebeater clung to his body, revealing his muscles.
meanings.sent5: The faded wifebeater had seen many days of hard work.
